ç»¿å‰æš´é›ª æˆ‘è¿˜æ˜¯ä¹ æƒ¯ä½ é‚£æ¡€éªœä¸é©¯çš„æ ·å­    ä¸‹è½½å°±æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†ç»™ä½ ä¸ªå·®è¯„
Managed to make everything in the game worse.

Unless youre willing to pay for the battle pass, this game does not respect your time or money. No way to earn future battle passes by completing the current season either, so pay some more and play some more. 

Long time player of the original on battle net, since launch with hours across 3 accounts that total 1000+. This was before roll lock was a thing, so a DPS Account, Tank Account, and Support Account to play the respective heros. The devs have historically been slow to launch balance patches that shake up the meta, and new heros use to dictate what was meta (until lifeweaver). A lack of stuns in the sequel means mobility is king in this game, and the fastest heros are usually what you want to play to win. A lack of a 2nd tank means any games with a doomfist 1 trick are a write off as a loss since your tank is probably going to int and die. 

PvE is about as basic as it gets, and the new PvE theyre giving us now is not the PvE they promised when they launched Ow2. They had to kill the original game because it would take away resources (read players) from Ow2 and the engine in the original could not support PvE. The PvE in ow2 is the exact same design as ow1. They didnt want their own game to kill their new cash grab game.

This game is a perfect example of how to completely ruin your brand and a sequel, no balance, p2w battlepass, for new players the worst possible character unlock system, bad management and ruin the lore, it's not a bomb review, it's a really bad game.

Suena bien, Â¿no? Bueno. Lo estarÃ­a si no fuera porque el progreso que hayas hecho antes, en este juego o el otro, no cuenta. I mean I played this game since 2016 for a reason. The Game rewarded you with looxbox each level up, there were no microtransactions except lootboxes that could have been acquired simply by just leveling up every few matches. Cosmetics werenÂ´t limted in a sense of Buy battle pass with a certain skin or never ever be able to get the skin again (or buy it for irl cash in store few months later Ig thatÂ´s what Blizzard is doing now). Anyways...The game has lost the spark of being Customer Friendly to being monetized cash grab, heck.. How can they charge for Hero PvE missions ??? What the heck is this ?. I dont have words.

OW porn>OW gameplay I guess. no more words to be said. (Altrough I no longer watch porn but can appreciate quality content when I see one...)
